entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wetaskiwin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Camrose 10:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -23.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: SE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
